SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.jooq
Interface Record

All Superinterfaces:
FieldProvider, Store<java.lang.Object>
All Known Subinterfaces:
TableRecord<R>, UDTRecord<R>, UpdatableRecord<R>
All Known Implementing Classes:
RecordImpl, TableRecordImpl, UDTRecordImpl, UpdatableRecordImpl
public interface Record
extends FieldProvider, Store<java.lang.Object>

A wrapper for database result records returned by SelectQuery

Author:
Lukas Eder
See Also:
Select.getResult()
